p: The radical scavenging activity, using the free-radical DPPH • assay was determined using the method of Li et al. [ 55] with slight modification. Briefly, the oils (100 μL) were reacted with 2.9 mL of DPPH • solution (0.0039 g DPPH • in 100 mL methanol). Absorbance of the oil extracts was done at 515 nm using a spectrophotometer. The absorbance results were converted using a calibration curve of the standard and expressed as mmol Trolox equivalent antioxidant capacity per mL −1 of oil (mmol TEAC mL −1).
